choices.text:
### Human:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for today.  I can't have dairy, garlic, honey, almonds
### Assistant:

Here is your daily meal plan, based on the ingredients you provided. Please note that this may not be suitable if you are allergic to any of these items or have specific dietary restrictions and requirements beyond what has been listed here. 

Breakfast: 
- 1 slice whole grain toast with peanut butter spread (no almonds) 
- 1 small banana 
- 8oz lowfat milk 

Lunch: 
- Turkey and cheese sandwich on whole wheat bread, lettuce, tomato, cucumber slices 
- Small apple 

Dinner: 
- 4 oz grilled chicken breast with lemon pepper seasoning (no garlic) 
- 1 cup steamed broccoli florets 
- 1/2 small sweet potato baked in the oven at 400 degrees for 20 minutes 
- 1 medium orange 

Snacks: 
- 1 small handful of pretzels without almonds or peanuts 
- 1 small container of plain Greek yogurt with strawberries and blueberries (no honey)<|im_end|>
